Package org.lemming.math

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FitterInterface
    interface for Fitter
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Calibration
    a class for handling the calibration process
    CalibrationCurve
    Fitter for the calibration curve
    Calibrator
    This class handle the calibration by calling the various method of the fitter.
    CentroidFitterIP
    Calculating centroids on a #ImageProcessor
    CentroidFitterRA<T extends net.imglib2.type.numeric.RealType<T>>
    Calculating centroids on a #RandomAccessibleInterval
    EllipticalGaussian
    EllipticalGaussian Fitter using sigmax and sigmay intermediates to calculate Z from the calibration curve
    EllipticalGaussianZ
    EllipticalGaussian Fitter directly calculating Z with the calibration curve parameters
    Gaussian2DFitter
    Fitter module for the 3D astigmatism fit calculating Z from sigmax and sigmay
    GaussianFitterZ
    Fitter module for the 3D astigmatism fit including direct Z calculation
    QuickSelect
    Median algorithms QuickSort and QuickSelect
    SubpixelLocalization
    Refine a set of peaks to subpixel coordinates.
    Symmetric2DFitter
    a fast symmetric 2D Gaussian fitter
    SymmetricGaussian
    ThunderSTORM algorithm for a symmetric Gaussian
